comment.author: 56690930@N04
comment._content: This doesn't appear to be the same building as the others labeled Richardson's Tavern in this collection. The roofline and setting look different.

comment.realname: Keene Public Library and the Historical Society of Cheshire County

comment._content: It appears to be the same fence though and the shutters look right. Perhaps it is just taken from the other side of the building.
